title: Dusk of Dawn - second paragrah significance

content.question: The second paragraph is significant in that the speaker

choices.label: cites a counterexample to that in the opening paragraph
makes use of the power of personal experience
outlines his assumptions about the reader's experiences
utilizes eyewitness accounts to document claims

content.answer: makes use of the power of personal experience

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
